Improve this doc View source

pfUtilizationDonutChart
directive in module patternfly.charts

Description

Focuses the pfDonutPctChart component, useful for rendering a percentage within a donut/radial chart. The Used Percentage fill starts at 12 oâ€™clock and moves clockwise. Whatever portion of the donut not Used, will be represented as Available, and rendered as a gray fill. There are three possible fill colors for Used Percentage, dependent on whether or not there are thresholds:

  • When no thresholds exist, or if the used percentage has not surpassed any thresholds, the indicator is blue.
  • When the used percentage has surpassed the warning threshold, but not the error threshold, the indicator is orange.
  • When the used percentage has surpassed the error threshold, the indicator is is red.

Usage

as element:
<pf-utilization-donut-chart
       chart-data="{object}"
       center-units="{string}"
       [center-label="{string}"]
       [center-units-only="{boolean}"]
       [charts-layout="{string}"]
       [chart-size="{number}"]
       [config="{object}"]
       [label-title="{string}"]
       [label-label="{string}"]
       [label-units="{string}"]
       [on-threshold-change="{function (threshold)}"]
       [threshold-error="{number|string}"]
       [threshold-warning="{number|string}"]>
</pf-utilization-donut-chart>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
chart-dataobject

the data to be shown in the utilization chart.

  • .used - number representing the amount used
  • .total - number representing the total amount
  • .dataAvailable - Flag if there is data available - default: true
center-unitsstring

to be displayed on the chart. Examples: "GB", "MHz", "I/Ops", etc...

center-label
(optional)
string

specifies the content format for the donut's center label.
Values:

  • 'used' - displays the Used amount in the center label (default)
  • 'available' - displays the Available amount in the center label
  • 'percent' - displays the Usage Percent of the Total amount in the center label
  • 'none' - does not display the center label
center-units-only
(optional)
boolean

when true, only show the numeric value and unit.

charts-layout
(optional)
string

indicates whether the external label should be centered, left, or right.
Values:

  • 'centered' - centers the external label
  • 'left' - place the external label to the left of the chart
  • 'right' - place the external label to the right of the chart
chart-size
(optional)
number

the pixel dimensions of the chart, since it's square applies to both height and width.

config
(optional)
object

configuration properties for the donut chart:
Values:

  • .tooltipFn(d) - user defined function to customize the tool tip (optional)
  • .onClickFn(d,i) - user defined function to handle when donut arc is clicked upon.
label-title
(optional)
string

the title displayed before the external label content.

label-label
(optional)
string

specifies the content format for the donut's external label.
Values:

  • 'used' - displays the Used amount in the center label (default)
  • 'available' - displays the Available amount in the center label
  • 'percent' - displays the Usage Percent of the Total amount in the center label
  • 'none' - does not display the center label
label-units
(optional)
string

to be displayed on the external label. Examples: "GB", "MHz", "I/Ops", etc...

on-threshold-change
(optional)
function (threshold

user defined function to handle when thresolds change.
'threshold' Values:

  • 'ok' - when ok threshold is set
  • 'warning' - when warning threshold is set
  • 'error' - when error threshold is set
threshold-error
(optional)
numberstring

error percentage threshold used to determine the Usage Percentage fill color.

threshold-warning
(optional)
numberstring

warning percentage threshold used to determine the Usage Percentage fill color.
